alert.note: Alert for Adair; Sequoyah (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 8:31PM CDT until May 15 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN SEQUOYAH AND SOUTHEASTERN ADAIR COUNTIES... At 830 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles west of Natural Dam to 5 miles west of Short to near Brushy, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Brushy Lake State Park... Short... Brushy... This includes Interstate 40 in Oklahoma near mile marker 316. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
